TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Add Air ControlFeature and AirspaceControlMeans Sub-Types.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create and add several Air ControlFeature and AirspaceControlMeans in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates several Air ControlFeatures and AirspaceControlMeans. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes Airspace Control Measures (ControlFeature message schema area) message elements, for instance Ground Picture > Air Defence. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created Air ControlFeature and AirspaceControlMeans are displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the LowLevelTransitRoute correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the CoordinatingAltitude correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the SpecialUseAirspace correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the StandardUseArmyAircraftFlightRoute correctly.
Nation B receives and displays the AirControlPoint correctly.
